participant_1.name: Ethan
participant_1.personality: Curious and imaginative, with a knack for exploring the unusual.
participant_1.background: i was born with my heart outside my body. i had to have a transplant. i can move objects with my mind. i'm a boy.

participant_2.name: Sophia
participant_2.personality: Energetic and determined, always striving for excellence in everything she does.
participant_2.background: my favorite color is yellow. i love italian food and garlic bread. i am a gold medalist olympian. gymnastics is my favorite sport. i workout four hours a day.
